TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Thyakan, title = Thyakan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thyakan} }

S.FORM: Thyakan i Hsinchu a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Thyakan. u kasalumaluma' nu Thyakan sa, 113 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 409 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 387 ku tademaw, pakalatu 95%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 22 ku tademaw, pakalatu 5%. u kasabinacadan, Tayal 89%, Amis 2%, Rukai 1%, zumazuma 2%.

Thyakan i Hsincho a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Thyakan. o kasalomaloma' no Thyakan sa, 113 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 409 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 387 ko tademaw, pakalato 95%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 22 ko tademaw, pakalato 5%. o kasabinacadan, Tayal 89%, Amis 2%, Rokai 1%, zomazoma 2%.
